00022 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00023 class TObjectShapeBase: 
00024                      public TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass>,
00025                      public imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<ObjectClass>
00026 {
00027 public:
00028        typedef TShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass> BaseClass;
00029        typedef imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<ObjectClass> BaseClass2;
00030 
00031        TObjectShapeBase(bool isEditable = false, const ISceneProvider* providerPtr = NULL);
00032 
00033 protected:
00034        // reimplemented (TShapeBase)
00035        virtual void OnSelectionChanged(bool isSelected);
00036        virtual void OnPositionChanged(const QPointF& position);
00037 
00038        // reimplemented (QGraphicsItem) 
00039        virtual QVariant itemChange(QGraphicsItem::GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant& value);
00040        virtual void mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00041        virtual void mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00042        virtual void mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr);
00043 
00044        // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)
00045        virtual void AfterUpdate(imod::IModel* modelPtr, int updateFlags, istd::IPolymorphic* updateParamsPtr);
00046 
00047        // abstract methods
00048        virtual void UpdateGraphicsItem(const ObjectClass& object) = 0;
00049 
00050 private:
00051        QPointF m_lastPosition;
00052        bool m_isObjectMoved;
00053 
00054        bool m_isShapeUpdateBlocked;
00055 
00056        istd::CChangeNotifier m_mousePressingNotifier;
00057 };

00062 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00063 TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::TObjectShapeBase(bool isEditable, const ISceneProvider* providerPtr)
00064 :      BaseClass(isEditable, providerPtr),
00065        m_isShapeUpdateBlocked(false),
00066        m_mousePressingNotifier(NULL, i2d::IObject2d::CF_OBJECT_POSITION | istd::IChangeable::CF_MODEL)
00067 {
00068        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::InactiveColor, QPen(Qt::darkGreen, 0));
00069        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::EditableColor, QPen(Qt::green, 0));
00070        BaseClass::SetPen(BaseClass::SelectedColor, QPen(Qt::yellow, 0));
00071 
00072        if (isEditable){
00073               BaseClass::setFlags(BaseClass::ItemIsMovable | BaseClass::ItemIsSelectable | BaseClass::ItemSendsGeometryChanges);
00074               BaseClass::setCursor(QCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor)); 
00075 
00076               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::EditableColor);
00077        }
00078        else{
00079               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::InactiveColor);
00080        }
00081 }

00088 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00089 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::OnSelectionChanged(bool isSelected)
00090 {
00091        if (isSelected){
00092               BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::SelectedColor);
00093        }
00094        else{
00095               if (BaseClass::IsEditable()){
00096                      BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::EditableColor);
00097               }
00098               else{
00099                      BaseClass::SwitchColorSheme(BaseClass::InactiveColor);         
00100               }
00101        }
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00106 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::OnPositionChanged(const QPointF& position)
00107 {
00108        i2d::IObject2d* objectPtr = BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr();
00109        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00110               QPointF offset = position - m_lastPosition;
00111 
00112               objectPtr->MoveCenterTo(i2d::CVector2d(offset) + objectPtr->GetCenter());
00113 
00114               m_lastPosition = position;
00115               m_isObjectMoved = true;
00116        }
00117 
00118        BaseClass::OnPositionChanged(position);
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00123 QVariant TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::itemChange(QGraphicsItem::GraphicsItemChange change, const QVariant& value)
00124 {
00125        if (!m_isShapeUpdateBlocked){
00126               return BaseClass::itemChange(change, value);
00127        }
00128 
00129        return value;
00130 }

00132 
00133 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00134 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mousePressEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00135 {
00136        BaseClass::mousePressEvent(eventPtr);
00137 
00138        if (BaseClass::IsEditable() && (eventPtr->button() == Qt::LeftButton)){
00139               m_lastPosition = BaseClass::pos();
00140               m_isObjectMoved = false;
00141 
00142               m_mousePressingNotifier.SetPtr(BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr());
00143        }
00144 }
00145 
00146 
00147 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00148 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mouseReleaseEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00149 {
00150        BaseClass::mouseReleaseEvent(eventPtr);
00151 
00152        if (m_isObjectMoved){
00153               m_mousePressingNotifier.Reset();
00154        }
00155        else{
00156               m_mousePressingNotifier.Abort();
00157        }
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00162 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::mouseDoubleClickEvent(QGraphicsSceneMouseEvent* eventPtr)
00163 {
00164        BaseClass::mouseDoubleClickEvent(eventPtr);
00165 
00166        m_mousePressingNotifier.Reset();
00167 }

00170 // reimplemented (imod::IObserver)

00172 template <class GraphicsItemClass, class ObjectClass>
00173 void TObjectShapeBase<GraphicsItemClass, ObjectClass>::AfterUpdate(imod::IModel* /*modelPtr*/, int /*updateFlags*/, istd::IPolymorphic* /*updateParamsPtr*/)
00174 {
00175        Q_ASSERT(!m_isShapeUpdateBlocked);
00176 
00177        ObjectClass* objectPtr = BaseClass2::GetObjectPtr();
00178        if (objectPtr != NULL){
00179               m_isShapeUpdateBlocked = true;
00180 
00181               UpdateGraphicsItem(*objectPtr);
00182 
00183               m_isShapeUpdateBlocked = false;
00184 
00185               BaseClass::update();
00186        }
00187 }
